Detailed Description

template<class Config_>
class stxxl::grow_shrink_stack< Config_ >

Efficient implementation that uses prefetching and overlapping.

Use it if your access patttern consists of many repeated push'es and pop's For semantics of the methods see documentation of the STL std::vector.

Construction from a stack.

Parameters:
stack_ stack object (could be external or internal, important is that it must have a copy constructor, top() and pop() methods )
